activities: CoSentry provides help desk services for international companies. The information collected on individuals consists of name, company ID number, work address, work phone number and work e-mail address. All information is stored in a secure database and access is restricted to an as needed basis for individual customer support.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU and Swiss data protection authorities
